DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study : - To assess efficacy tolerability vardenafil male subject suffer erectile dysfunction compare placebo- To assess influence vardenafil self-esteem self-confidence subject suffer erectile dysfunction follow treatment vardenafil compare placebo
DOC.criteria: Men heterosexual relationship age 18 64 year suffer ED 6 month accord NIH Consensus Statement ( i.e . inability attain and/or maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) . At least 4 attempt sexual intercourse ( accord question subject diary ) 4 separate day 4week untreated baseline period . At least 50 % attempts period unsuccessful accord subject diary . Presence penile anatomical abnormality ( eg penile fibrosis Peyronie 's disease ) investigator 's opinion would significantly impair sexual performance . Primary hypoactive sexual desire.Spinal cord injuryHistory surgical prostatectomy ( transurethral intervention exclude ) . Unstable angina pectoris . History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month . Uncontrolled atrial fibrillation/flutter screen visit ( ventricular response rate > 100 BPM ) .
DOC.keyword: SSES-E ( sexual self-efficacy scale - erectile function )
